title: Side Effects Black Girl Gymnasts (with Amira Rose Davis)
description:
This week we talk to Amira Rose Davis, host of American Prodigies season 3 about documenting the nuanced experience of being at the intersection of race, gender, and sports.
~
For more content, subscribe to our Patreon (patreon.com/smartfunnyandblack)!
~
Stop overpaying for shipping with Stamps.com. Sign up with promo code DOSES for a special offer that includes a 4-week trial, free postage, and a digital scale. No long-term commitments or contracts. Just go to Stamps.com, click the microphone at the top of the page, and enter code DOSES.
Grab Liquid I.V. in bulk nationwide at Costco, or you can get 25% off when you go to LiquidIV.com and use code DOSES at checkout.
Listen to Call Me Curious on Apple Podcasts, Amazon Music or wherever you listen. You can listen early and ad-free by subscribing to Wondery Plus in Apple Podcasts or the Wondery app.
Well-Read Black Girl highlights important stories about the journey and craft of Black creators, ensuring their voices are not only heard, but celebrated. Listen to Well-Read Black Girl wherever you get your podcasts and make sure you stay tuned until the end of this episode for a special preview of Well-Read Black Girl. 
For simple, smart savings on your prescriptions, check GoodRx at GoodRX.com/doses. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

content:encoded:
This week we talk to Amira Rose Davis, host of American Prodigies season 3 about documenting the nuanced experience of being at the intersection of race, gender, and sports.

~

For more content, subscribe to our Patreon (patreon.com/smartfunnyandblack)!

~

Stop overpaying for shipping with Stamps.com. Sign up with promo code DOSES for a special offer that includes a 4-week trial, free postage, and a digital scale. No long-term commitments or contracts. Just go to Stamps.com, click the microphone at the top of the page, and enter code DOSES.

Grab Liquid I.V. in bulk nationwide at Costco, or you can get 25% off when you go to LiquidIV.com and use code DOSES at checkout.

Listen to Call Me Curious on Apple Podcasts, Amazon Music or wherever you listen. You can listen early and ad-free by subscribing to Wondery Plus in Apple Podcasts or the Wondery app.

Well-Read Black Girl highlights important stories about the journey and craft of Black creators, ensuring their voices are not only heard, but celebrated. Listen to Well-Read Black Girl wherever you get your podcasts and make sure you stay tuned until the end of this episode for a special preview of Well-Read Black Girl. 

For simple, smart savings on your prescriptions, check GoodRx at GoodRX.com/doses.
